page.title: 12 CLUBS IN KENNINGTON
page.content: There are a varying number of clubs in {KENNINGTON.}One of the main purposes of theses club is to raise money for all sorts of charities. Fund raising is not the only aspect of these clubs. They also organise many dancing and social evenings for all ages. The{ {WOMEN'S INSTITUTE }is just one of the many clubs organising plays, nursery groups and fetes.{BROWNIES, GUIDES, {SERVICEMENS CLUB}, organises card teams which go away and play against neighbouring counties. Clubs such as these give young and old people a place to go and meet people. The clubs also give lots of opportunities to learn new and interesting hobbies and crafts. The people that organize these clubs are volunteers. There are many clubs for sports like football, cricket, table tennis and badmington.
